languages.text: Special attack: If target fails TOU test, they gains for all wielders allies a permanent Opening

traits.locale_text: This weapon has a special attack that forces its target to make a Toughness resistance test. If failed, a permanent opening is created on that target's side closest to the wielder. The wielder and their allies gain benefits of that opening.
